_comment: MCP servers for this project. Set API keys in environment variables. Servers marked [FREE] need no API key.

context7._comment: [FREE] Up-to-date, version-specific library documentation injected into context

sequential-thinking._comment: [FREE] Enhanced complex problem decomposition -- debugging, migrations, architecture decisions

memory._comment: [FREE] Persistent memory across sessions via knowledge graph -- remembers user preferences and context

fetch._comment: [FREE] Fetch web content and convert HTML to markdown for LLM consumption

playwright._comment: [FREE] Browser automation and E2E testing via accessibility snapshots

github._comment: [FREE TOKEN] GitHub repo management: PRs, issues, CI/CD -- requires GITHUB_TOKEN (free at github.com/settings/tokens)

brave-search._comment: [FREE TIER] Web search via Brave API -- 2000 queries/month free at brave.com/search/api/
